name: SpudRush
description:
You as the farmer need to feed your family with the only food you have, potatoes. With the endless torture of poorness can u survive this? 

Press WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Press E to interact 

How to play

You need to fill the potatoes bar before times up. When you're done, the timer will count how much your family has eaten. 

Theme One isn't enough

This game was made in 6 hours by us
